description.narrative: By 2021, planning departments of key social ministries have increased capacities to use evidence to plan, budget and implement national plans and policies for children in a results-based manner.

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Phra Athit Road Banglumpoo Pranakorn Bangkok 10200

sector.narrative: PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, planning departments of key social ministries have increased capacities to use evidence to plan, budget and implement national plans and policies for children in a results-based manner.

description.narrative: Important milestones towards stronger planning, budgeting and monitoring of critical national plans and strategies were reached this year. On public finance, new MoUs with the Fiscal Policy Office and the Parliamentary Budget Office will provide opportunities for UNICEF to strengthen child-focused policies and budgeting under the current CP. Monitoring of the national ECD strategy was a priority; UNICEF provided technical support with application and budgeting to accelerate and strengthen its adoption and implementation. 2019 marks the first knowledge building initiative on PF4C in the form of 4 budget brief papers. These advocacy tools will improve budget allocation for children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Extend to which National ECD plan is budgeted Level 1: National ECD Plan is translated into line ministries

Extend to which Strategic planning,budgeting and evaluation capacities of line ministries are strengthened.Level1:Strategic assessment of planning,budgeting,evaluation,and RBM skills of government staff with gap analysis on cascading the social KPIs from 20-Year National Strategy to ministerial level focusing on ECD is conducted.Level2:At least 25 officials from OPDC,BB,NESDB,MOPH,MSDHS,MOEandMOI are trained on strategic planning,budgeting and evaluation based on RBM.Level3:Proposed set of socia

Extent to which RBM Capacity of ECD related line ministries is strengthened. Level 1: RBM Skills assessment is conducted Level 2: A cadre of national master trainers on RBM is in place Level 3: RBM national curriculum is developed Level 4: At least 50 Planning officials from line ministries are trained on RBM

Extent to which National ECD strategic plan (NESP) is budgeted in a cross-sectoral (agenda) budget allocation strategy with MTEF. Level1:Feasibility assessment for ECD as stand-alone cross-sectoral (agenda) budget allocation strategy is completed in consultation with BB and related agencies. Level2:NESP is costed. Level3:MTEF for NESP is completed. Level4:Costed National ECD Plan with MTEF is considered by BOB for cross-sectoral (agenda) budget allocation strategy.

Extent to which ECD strategic plan is budgeted from area-based budget allocation strategy at provincial level.Level1:NESP is translated into Provincial ECD Strategic Plan.Level2:Assessment of existing and opportunity on area-based budget for ECD related programmes is completed.Level3:Pilot project in(1-3 provinces)on area-based budget modality for ECD is conducted with completed budget requested for BB consideration and plan to scale up the modality to all provinces.Level4:Results and key lesson
